Source.Name: leiningen
Source.Summary: Leiningen is for automating Clojure projects without setting your hair on fire.
Source.Description: Leiningen is the easiest way to use Clojure. With a focus on project automation and declarative configuration, it gets out of your way and lets you focus on your code.

Package.Name: leiningen
